siteMetadata.title: Blog by Kalin Chernev
siteMetadata.subtitle: Writing crystallizes thought and thought produces action.

frontmatter.title: Debugging node.js in Cloud9 IDE
frontmatter.description: In this article I'll be sharing some of my level-up experience learning how to debug node.js apps. It was not easy at first, but once I got it, I felt empowered that now I can work with any code base.
